ResourceHeader.Description: Hybrid simulation model developped at LATMOS for plasma interaction with celestial neutral environments (planets or moons)

Property.Name: Ionopause Altitude
Property.Description: Altitude of the ionopause in the model That is the altitude below which ion densities are computed analytically

InputPopulation.Name: Ionospheric electrons
InputPopulation.Description: Electron fluid in the planet ionosphere
InputPopulation.Profile: Temperature for a density of 304.00cm-3, Adiabatic profile below 120.99cm-3, hydrostatic above.

Property.Name: Ionopause Altitude
Property.Description: Altitude of the ionopause in the model That is the altitude below which ion densities are computed analytically
